name: Warhamburger: Veggietide
description:
Play as a charcoal grill-based "mecha"-style robot, which uses its high-power charcoal briquette cannon to fight off an invasion of a caricature of a McCarthy-ist American suburban neighborhood by giant communist vegetables.

Developed in a team of five over the course of two weeks with Alex Weisenbach, Nick Smith, Carl Maulfair, and Min Park.
